name: sword
text: You see a sword laying discarded on the floor.
option2_outcomes: You leave the sword behind and continue trying to find the exit to the maze. A howl sounds from somewhere in the maze, and you start to regret not taking the weapon.

name: minotaur
text: The minataur, a beast with the body of a man and the head of a bull, rounds the next corner.

name: witches
text: As you continue on in the maze, smoke starts surrounding you. You see various creatures lurking in the smoke and hear laughter. Suddenly you are in front of a group of witches. They demand you answer their riddle.

name: skeleton
text: A skeleton is wandering the maze, blocking your path. It's holding a sword and shield, and is animated by some kind of dark magic

name: chest
text: You find a chest. Do you risk opening it, or leave it behind?

name: armour
text: you find a rusted set of armour.

name: slime
text: A slime blocks your path. It looks like it could swallow you whole.

name: sphynx
text: A sphynx guards the way. It demands you answer the riddle if you want to pass.

name: mutant rat
text: A giant rat, the size of a dog, scurries towards you, it's sharp claws making marks in the ground as it moves.

name: healing fountain
text: You come across a healing fountain. There is gold at the bottom, but if taken, it does not allow you to heal.

name: crazyman
text: A half-naked man runs towards you, his eyes wild and his hair left uncut. He suddenly screams and starts running faster towards you.

name: wolf pack
text: You hear howling in the distance. You try to stay quiet, but to no avail. The wolves are upon you.
